Are you a Chinese company looking to cheat American workers? You’re in luck! [[user]] handed you another gift: his veto of HJRes.39, our bipartisan bill to stop the Admin. from giving Chinese solar producers a free pass to circumvent tariffs. Today, I voted to OVERRIDE his veto.

I had a great visit today with the Radiology Associates of North Texas as we discussed their workforce issues and my efforts to get more students into their industry. I also had the opportunity to tour a Long Term Care Facility and discuss legislation I've worked on to better support their operation.
